item.description:
Boston's largest young-professional New Year's Eve event

Thursday, December 31, 2009

Top of The Hub Skywalk
8pm to 1am
Featuring The Love Dogs

What is included:
Your night to remember starts with a cocktail reception and a scrumptious reception with passed hors d'oeuvres and food stations.

Then, slide over to the dance floor as the live band, The Love Dogs, and a DJ help you dance the night away with swing, Motown, Soul, R & B, 70s, 80s, 90s and current top-40 dance hits.

As the clock strikes midnight, ring in 2010 with tons of party favors and a countdown celebration on huge video displays! VIP goody bag is filled with items from our sponsors.

Cost:
Prices are started at $103 but is increasing as we get closer to the event. The next price cutoff point is December 18th. See The Boston Event Guide's website for details. Resolution Ball 2010

** 12/17/09 Price update: Get an extra $10 off the prevailing ticket price by using the "Coupon code":
NYEVIP
* Current ticket price (including service fee) is $129 - less $10 discount = $119
* THIS PRICE IS GOOD UNTIL 12/18 = tomorrow, Friday.

Robyn and several of our other members who went last year have already made their reservations because we had such a great time!
item.name: New Year's Eve Resolution Ball 2010
